ingredients.name: hot sauce, such as Tabasco® or to taste
buttery crackers, such as Ritz® crackers, crushed

steps.text: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Lightly grease a 9x13-inch baking dish.

substeps.text: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).

steps.text: Place chicken, chicken soup, sour cream, cheese, green onions, almonds, bacon, and hot sauce into a large mixing bowl and stir to combine.  Pour mixture into the prepared dish.

substeps.text: Place chicken, chicken soup, sour cream, cheese, green onions, almonds, bacon, and hot sauce into a large mixing bowl and stir to combine.
Pour mixture into the prepared dish.

steps.text: Stir crushed crackers and butter together until combined; spread mixture evenly over casserole.

substeps.text: Stir crushed crackers and butter together until combined; spread mixture evenly over casserole.

steps.text: Bake in the preheated oven until browned and bubbly, 40 to 45 minutes.
